content: Do you mean you want to hide Unified Inbox? If yes, then: Settings > General settings > Display > "Account list" section > uncheck "Show Unified Inbox" > close Thunderbird for Android > start Thunderbird for Android again.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: I have two accounts. I turned off unified inbox. But now when I open T-bird it shows me the wrong inbox. How do I set my main one as the default?
creator: ptrdahl11

content:
Peter Dahl said
But now when I open T-bird it shows me the wrong inbox. How do I set my main one as the default?

The following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "Accounts" section > press and hold the two-horizontal-bar icon on the right hand side of your main email account > drag and drop the two-horizontal-bar icon (and the corresponding email account) to the top of the list of email accounts > close Thunderbird for Android > start Thunderbird for Android again.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
